snippet: Thomas Robinson, the brawny Kansas forward who was the first unanimous first-team all-American since Blake Griffin, is leaving for the N.B.A.
abstract: Kansas forward Thomas Robinson and Baylor forward Perry Jones III will abandon their college careers to enter the NBA draft.
lead_paragraph: Thomas Robinson, the brawny Kansas forward who was the first unanimous first-team all-American since Blake Griffin, is leaving for the N.B.A.

headline.main: Kansas and Baylor Stars Enter N.B.A. Draft
headline.print_headline: Kansas and Baylor Stars Enter N.B.A. Draft
